short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Watch your favourite Netflix show, Twitch Stream, YouTube, Google and other visual media content dimmed

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Watch your favourite Netflix show, Twitch Stream, YouTube,  Reddit, Google and other visual media content dimmed. Change the brightness to your preference

Dims Netflix, YouTube, Reddit, Twitch, Videos, Streams and Images 

For everyone that like their media content dimmed.
★  for you to watch your favourite content at night  
★  for your study or work session in the dark
★  for protecting your eyes, bright lighting and too much glare can strain your eyes

Simple 
★  Simple UI and responsive to almost every site 
★  Saves your settings for your convenience 
★  Also compliments dark mode extensions

Please feel free to contact me if you have any issues or requests
Thank you and enjoy!

Version Update:
0.4 popup HTML update
0.3 Improvement to extensions UI 
0.2 Better implementation of CSS brightness filter for working on more sites. (continuously improving CSS implementation)
0.1 Initial release 

Permissions & reason  
storage: for you to be able to save your settings, when closing extension or exiting your browser 
tabs: for extension to apply filter at current focused tab
scripting: for Implementation of CSS brightness filter 
host permission: for permission to apply filter into current site
